text: Dimitar Petrov (, born 8 October 1958) is a Bulgarian rower. He competed in the men's double sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Bulgaria Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Dimitar Petrov (rower)
